content: Multitool saw blade BiM segmented saw blade for the oscillating multitool, for sawing nail embedded wood, plastics, and metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Multi-tool inserts- ### FEATURES:Features Increased versatility – quickly swap out saw blade attachments to cover a wide range of base materials and applications More sustainable - adapt the Hilti SMT-6 multitool for different applications and base materials by switching inserts, without stocking multiple tools More flexibility – Starlock interface is compatible with all Starlock multitools on the market Easier to change inserts - Starlock compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Applications BiM segmented blades for trimming nail embedded wood, plastic, and metal Expand the range of applications possible with the Hilti multitool ### TECHNICAL DATA: Additional Accessory Information: Starlock BiMetal niversal half-moon saw blade, recommended for hardwood, laminnate, soft nails, thin metal, drywall, and epoxy. 3 1/8 diameter. Technical Data | Additional Accessory Information | Starlock BiMetal niversal half-moon saw blade, recommended for hardwood, laminnate, soft nails, thin metal, drywall, and epoxy. 3 1/8 diameter. ### ITEMS- 2368507 - Blade SMT BiM Saw - Package Size 1 pc
